sentences.en: A huge nuclear reactor now spoils the view.
sentences.cn: 现在有个庞大的核反应堆破坏了景致。

sentences.en: an opportunity to view the film before it goes on general release
sentences.cn: 在影片公映之前观影的机会

sentences.en: Disappointingly, this show is only on view for a week.
sentences.cn: 令人失望的是，这次展览仅持续一周。

sentences.en: During an eclipse, the moon blocks our view of the sun (= stop us from seeing it ).
sentences.cn: 日蚀的时候，月亮遮挡住了太阳。

sentences.en: First-generation Americans view the United States as a land of golden opportunity.
sentences.cn: 第一代美国人把美国看成一个充满良机的大陆。

sentences.en: Fran hit him in full view of all the guests (= where they could see it clearly ).
sentences.cn: 弗兰当着所有宾客的面打了他。

sentences.en: From the top you get a panoramic view of the city.
sentences.cn: 从顶部你可以一览该市的全貌。

sentences.en: In my view, the country needs a change of government.
sentences.cn: 依我看，这个国家需要换个政府。

sentences.en: It’s an issue that can be viewed from several perspectives.
sentences.cn: 这是一个可从多个角度来看待的问题。

sentences.en: My own view is absolutely clear. What I did was right.
sentences.cn: 我自己的观点非常清楚。我做的事是正确的。

sentences.en: Officers felt their point of view was not getting across to ministers.
sentences.cn: 官员们感觉自己的观点并未准确地传达到大臣们那里。

sentences.en: On South Main Street, a huge brick building looms into view.
sentences.cn: 在南大街上，一座巨大的砖砌建筑赫然出现在人们的视线中。

sentences.en: Teachers often view youth workers as undisciplined and ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 老师们常认为青少年工作者纪律性差且能力低下。

sentences.en: The argument contained herein takes exactly the opposite point of view.
sentences.cn: 本文所持的论点恰恰是站在相反的立场。

sentences.en: The book contains over fifty scenic views of Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 书中有五十多幅剑桥的风景照。

sentences.en: The couple hold the unfashionable view that marriage is a sacred union.
sentences.cn: 夫妇俩对婚姻的看法很传统，认为婚姻是神圣的结合。

sentences.en: The drama takes an idealistic, even a naive view of the subject.
sentences.cn: 这部戏在对待这一主题上有些理想化，甚至是天真。

sentences.en: The law should be viewed as a way of meeting certain social goals.
sentences.cn: 这项法规应被视为实现某些社会目标的一种途径。

sentences.en: The view of lake and plunging cliffs seduces visitors.
sentences.cn: 湖光旖旎、峭壁峥嵘，游客们被深深吸引了。

sentences.en: the youth was keeping him in view.
sentences.cn: 那个少年一直盯着他。

sentences.en: They came back to view the house again.
sentences.cn: 他们又回来察看了一下房子。

sentences.en: This picture shows the view from a car using normal dipped lights.
sentences.cn: 这幅图片显示的是从一辆使用正常近光灯的汽车上所看到的景色。

sentences.en: Try to look at this from my point of view.
sentences.cn: 试着从我的角度来看这件事。

sentences.en: Try to view situations more objectively, especially with regard to work.
sentences.cn: 要尽量客观地分析情况，尤其是在工作上。

sentences.en: We took time to stop and admire the view.
sentences.cn: 我们特意驻足欣赏风景。

sentences.en: What other home offers such a commanding view of the capital?
sentences.cn: 还有其他的房子能像这幢一样俯瞰首都吗？

sentences.en: What’s your view on the subject?
sentences.cn: 你对这个问题怎么看？

sentences.en: Young men climbed on buses and fences to get a better view.
sentences.cn: 为了看得更清楚些，年轻人爬上了公共汽车和围墙。

words.tran_cn: 无景色的；无意见的；看不见的
观察者；观看者；电视观众；[仪] 指示器

phrases.tran_cn: 经眼力观察，经表面的观察
为能看到摆出来的；展出的

trans.tran_cn: 看法，态度，观看，视线，景色，风景画/照，显示方式
trans.tran_en: what you think or believe about something
to watch a television programme, film etc

trans.tran_cn: 看待， 考虑， 估量； 观察， 看
trans.tran_en: to watch a television programme, film etc
